scripts.test: npm run test:android && npm run test:ios
scripts.test:ios: PLATFORM=ios WATCH=false MODE=native npm run common
scripts.test:ios:chrome: PLATFORM=ios WATCH=false MODE=chrome-debugging npm run common
scripts.test:catalyst: PLATFORM=catalyst WATCH=false MODE=native npm run common
scripts.test:catalyst:chrome: PLATFORM=catalyst WATCH=false MODE=chrome-debugging npm run common
scripts.test:android: PLATFORM=android WATCH=false MODE=native npm run common
scripts.test:android:chrome: PLATFORM=android WATCH=false MODE=chrome-debugging npm run common
scripts.watch:ios: PLATFORM=ios WATCH=true MODE=native npm run common
scripts.watch:ios:chrome: PLATFORM=ios WATCH=true MODE=chrome-debugging npm run common
scripts.watch:catalyst: PLATFORM=catalyst WATCH=true MODE=native npm run common
scripts.watch:catalyst:chrome: PLATFORM=catalyst WATCH=true MODE=chrome-debugging npm run common
scripts.watch:android: PLATFORM=android WATCH=true MODE=native npm run common
scripts.watch:android:chrome: PLATFORM=android WATCH=true MODE=chrome-debugging npm run common
scripts.common: mocha-remote --context mode=$MODE,$MOCHA_REMOTE_CONTEXT --watch $WATCH -- concurrently --kill-others-on-fail npm:app-importer npm:metro npm:runner
